scripts.bump-version: node -e "const fs=require('fs'),path=require('path');const v=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(path.join(__dirname,'version.json'),'utf8'));const p=v.version.split('.');p[2]=(parseInt(p[2])+1).toString();v.version=p.join('.');fs.writeFileSync(path.join(__dirname,'version.json'),JSON.stringify(v,null,2));console.log('版本已更新为:',v.version);" && node scripts/sync-version.js
